meanings.definition: The fruiting body of an ascomycete fungus, containing its spores.
meanings.sent1: The ascocarps released tiny spores into the air.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study ascocarps to learn more about fungal reproduction.
meanings.sent3: The ascocarps decided to throw a spore party in the forest.
meanings.sent4: The ascocarps were like treasure chests full of fungal secrets.
meanings.sent5: Walking through the forest, I stumbled upon a cluster of ascocarps, each one a spore-filled wonder.
